name: Projeto Ecolocalização
description:
In this game the player is a bat that has to reach the end of the phase q is in motion plus the blocks are invisible and the bat has to make a sound that will touch the invisible walls and will make them visible with the echolocation but he has to flee from light that is chasing him

Player: move in w and s, shoot in space

Light: kill the bat wall: disturbs the player and is invisible

sound: leave visible walls
